header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_ProxyPullSupplier

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::ProxyPullSupplier interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_any_pull_consumer(ProxyPullSupplier, PullConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a consumer to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects the given PullConsumer to the target object. If a connection already exists the AlreadyConnected exception is raised.

func.name: pull(ProxyPullSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Pull an Any event from the proxy

desc.p: This operation pulls next #any{} event, and blocks, if the target object have no events to forward, until an event can be delivered. If no client have been connected the Disconnected exception is raised.

func.name: try_pull(ProxyPullSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Try and pull an Any event from the proxy

desc.p: This operation pulls next event, but do not block if the target object have no event to forward. If no client have been connected the Disconnected exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_pull_supplier(ProxyPullSupplier) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: Invoking this operation will cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
